"Generally available" here means that the default state for people in the EU is that they cannot access it without a VPN (possibly requiring paying for it.) If available in certain EU countries (as was the case in Italy in early 2023), or available to (for example) minors, this will still resolve negatively, assuming at least >50% of the population cannot use it.

"ChatGPT" here refers to the general web interface (not the API) for interacting with GPT models. Still resolves negatively if the name or website has changed, as long as OpenAI's service is substantially the same (entering queries to systems based on Large Language Models).

(b) Resolves YES if the market embedded at https://manifold.markets/embed/Mira_/how-many-traders-will-this-market-g does not have 377 traders before market close (July 15, 11:59 PM Pacific Time). Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will take place: (a) OpenAI's ChatGPT will be widely accessible in the European Union by June 30, 2024, and (b) the associated market will have a minimum of 377 traders by the conclusion of July 15, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) The question will be considered **YES** if [ChatGPT](chat.openai.com) is widely accessible in the EU on June 30, 2024, and **NO** otherwise.

"Widely accessible" means that the standard condition for individuals in the EU is that they can use it without a VPN (potentially requiring payment). If it is not accessible in certain EU nations (as was the situation in Italy in early 2023), or not available to (for instance) minors, it will still be resolved positively, provided that over 50% of the population can access it.

"ChatGPT" refers to the general web interface (not the API) for engaging with GPT models. It will still resolve positively if the name or website changes, as long as OpenAI's service remains fundamentally the same (inputting queries to systems based on Large Language Models).

(b) It will resolve YES if the market found at https://manifold.markets/embed/Mira_/how-many-traders-will-this-market-g has 377 traders before the market closes (July 15, 11:59 PM Pacific Time). It will resolve NO otherwise.

question.title: Will 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20?
question.body:
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html

If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows 10 or more Dem Senators, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

not_P.title: Will fewer than 10 Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20?
not_P.body:
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html

If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows fewer than 10 Dem Senators, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

para_P.title: Will 10 or more Democratic Senators urge Biden to resign prior to July 20?
para_P.body:
Source of resolution: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html

If there are 10 or more Democratic Senators who express this before midnight July 20 Central Time, this market will be deemed a yes. If not, it will be a no.

question.title: If 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20, will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body:
Resolution criteria for the condition: If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, the New York Times shows 10 or more Democratic Senators calling for Biden to drop out, the condition is met. Otherwise, it is not.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g., Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: If 10 or more Democratic Senators do not call for Biden to drop out before July 20, will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body:
Resolution criteria for the condition: If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, the New York Times does not show 10 or more Democratic Senators calling for Biden to drop out, the condition is met. Otherwise, it is not.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g., Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Should 10 or more Democratic Senators urge Biden to resign prior to July 20, will there be an additional debate for the Democratic presidential candidates?
para_P.body:
Criteria for meeting the condition: If at any time before midnight on July 20 Central Time, the New York Times reports that 10 or more Democratic Senators are urging Biden to resign, then the condition is satisfied. If not, it is not satisfied.

Criteria for determining the outcome: Resolves to YES if there is a debate among potential Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves to NO if there is not.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20 and (b) there is another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body:
(a) Will 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20?
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html
If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows 10 or more Dem Senators, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

(b) Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20 nor (b) there is another Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body:
(a) Will fewer than 10 Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20?
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html
If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows fewer than 10 Dem Senators, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

(b) Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of the following to happen: (a) at least 10 Democratic Senators urge Biden to resign before July 20 and (b) another Democratic presidential debate takes place?
para_P.body:
(a) Will at least 10 Democratic Senators urge Biden to resign before July 20?
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html
If there are 10 or more Democratic Senators by midnight July 20 Central Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

(b) Will another Democratic presidential debate occur?
This resolves to YES if a debate among potential Democratic candidates (like Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) happens before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It resolves to NO in all other cases.

question.title: Will Latvia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Latvia does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Latvia not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Latvia does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Latvia qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Latvia going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if Latvia competes in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Conversely, if Latvia fails to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Given Latvia qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Belgium also qualify?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Given this, will Belgium also qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?

Resolution criteria for Belgium: Resolves YES if Belgium participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Given Latvia qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Belgium not qualify?
not_P.body:
Suppose the following is true: Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Given this, will Belgium not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?

Resolution criteria for Belgium: Resolves YES if Belgium participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having not qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: If Latvia secures a spot in the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024, will Belgium also make it?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: Latvia competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a place in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. In this scenario, will Belgium also earn qualification for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?

Criteria for determining Belgium's qualification: Resolves to YES if Belgium competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a place in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Resolves to NO in all other cases.

question.title: Will both Latvia and Belgium qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both Latvia and Belgium participate in their respective Semi-finals and are then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Latvia or Belgium does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Latvia nor Belgium qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither Latvia nor Belgium participate in their respective Semi-finals or are not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Latvia or Belgium qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are Latvia and Belgium set to reach the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This question will conclude with a **Yes** if both Latvia and Belgium take part in their respective Semi-finals and are subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having made it to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Should either Latvia or Belgium fail to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Will Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Ireland going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Ireland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Conversely, if Ireland fails to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Given Ireland qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Luxembourg qualify as well?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Then, will Luxembourg also qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024? 

Resolution criteria: 
- For Ireland, it resolves as true if Ireland qualifies for the Grand Final as announced by EBU.
- For Luxembourg, it resolves as true if Luxembourg qualifies for the Grand Final as announced by EBU. If Luxembourg does not qualify, it resolves as false.

not_P.title: Given Ireland qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Luxembourg not qualify as well?
not_P.body:
Suppose the following is true: Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Then, will Luxembourg also not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024? 

Resolution criteria: 
- For Ireland, it resolves as true if Ireland qualifies for the Grand Final as announced by EBU.
- For Luxembourg, it resolves as true if Luxembourg does not qualify for the Grand Final as announced by EBU. If Luxembourg qualifies, it resolves as false.

para_P.title: If Ireland secures a spot in the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024, will Luxembourg also earn a place?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: Ireland competes in a Semi-final and is confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured its position in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. In that case, will Luxembourg also make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024? 

Resolution criteria: 
- For Ireland, it is considered true if Ireland is confirmed to have qualified for the Grand Final as stated by the EBU.
- For Luxembourg, it is considered true if Luxembourg is confirmed to have qualified for the Grand Final as stated by the EBU. If Luxembourg does not qualify, it is considered false.

question.title: Will both Ireland and Luxembourg qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following occur: (a) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Luxembourg participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both do not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will either Ireland or Luxembourg not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following occurs: (a) Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Luxembourg does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If both qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are both Ireland and Luxembourg set to advance to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met: (a) Ireland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (b) Luxembourg takes part in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the EBU as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either or both do not advance, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Will Russia have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories:



- Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine

- Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Assessed Russian Control

- Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location



The question will resolve as **No** if the location is not assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:



- Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives

- Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location

not_P.title: Will Russia not have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as not under any of the following categories:



- Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine

- Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Assessed Russian Control

- Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location



The question will resolve as **No** if the location is assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:



- Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives

- Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location.

para_P.title: Will Russia gain dominance over Chasiv Yar by June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if, on June 1, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) indicates the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E fall under any of the following classifications:



- Evaluated Russian Progress in Ukraine

- Evaluated Russian Gains in the Last 24 Hours

- Evaluated Russian Control

- Claimed Russian Territory within Ukraine

- Any additional categories established by ISW that signify Russian control over the area



The inquiry will be marked as **No** if the location is not classified under any categories that suggest Russian control, which includes but is not restricted to:



- Documented Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Last 24 Hours

- Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives

- Reported Ukrainian Partisan Activities

- Any further categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control over the area or a lack of Russian dominance over the location.

question.title: Given Russia has control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: On June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under Russian control according to categories such as Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine, Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours, Assessed Russian Control, Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine, or any other categories indicating Russian control. Then, will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolution criteria for the outcome: This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The announcement must be unambiguous and conclusive. If such a statement is not made by then, this question will resolve as No.

not_P.title: Given Russia has control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will accept the Democratic nomination for President?
not_P.body:
Suppose the following is true: On June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under Russian control according to categories such as Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine, Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours, Assessed Russian Control, Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine, or any other categories indicating Russian control. Then, will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolution criteria for the outcome: This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement that he will seek and will accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The announcement must be unambiguous and conclusive. If such a statement is not made by then, this question will resolve as No.

para_P.title: If Russia maintains control over Chasiv Yar by June 1, 2024, will Joe Biden declare before July 15, 2024, that he will decline the Democratic nomination for President?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: On June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map indicates that the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E are under Russian control, as per classifications like Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine, Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours, Assessed Russian Control, Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine, or any other categories denoting Russian dominance. Then, will Joe Biden make a declaration before July 15, 2024, stating that he will not accept the nomination from the Democratic Party for President?

Criteria for resolution: This inquiry will conclude as Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear, public, official declaration that he will not pursue and will not accept the nomination from his party for another presidential term in the 2024 election cycle. The announcement must be clear and definitive. If such a statement is not made by that time, this question will resolve as No.

question.title: Will Russia control Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, and will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if both of the following conditions are met:

1. On June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories indicating Russian control:
   - Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine
   - Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours
   - Assessed Russian Control
   - Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine
   - Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location

   The question will resolve as **No** if the location is not assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:
   - Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours
   - Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives
   - Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare
   - Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location.

2. Prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Both conditions must be satisfied for this question to resolve as Yes.

not_P.title: Will Russia not control Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, or will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024, that he will accept the Democratic nomination for President?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if at least one of the following conditions is met:

1. On June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) does not show the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories indicating Russian control:
   - Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine
   - Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours
   - Assessed Russian Control
   - Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine
   - Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location.

   The question will resolve as **No** if the location is assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:
   - Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours
   - Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives
   - Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare
   - Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location.

2. Prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will seek and will accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as Yes.

At least one of the conditions must be satisfied for this question to resolve as Yes.

para_P.title: On June 1, 2024, will Russia have authority over Chasiv Yar, and will Joe Biden declare before July 15, 2024, that he will not pursue the Democratic nomination for President?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if both of the following criteria are fulfilled:

1. On June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) indicates the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as falling under any of the subsequent classifications that demonstrate Russian authority:
   - Evaluated Russian Progress in Ukraine
   - Evaluated Russian Gains in the Last 24 Hours
   - Evaluated Russian Control
   - Asserted Russian Territory in Ukraine
   - Any other classifications created by ISW that signify Russian control of the area

   The inquiry will be considered **No** if the area is not evaluated to be in any of the classifications indicating Russian authority, which includes but is not limited to:
   - Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Last 24 Hours
   - Asserted Ukrainian Counteroffensives
   - Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare
   - Any other classifications created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian authority over the area or a lack of Russian authority over the area.

2. Before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear, public, official statement declaring that Joe Biden will not seek nor accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. The statement must be clear and final, eliminating any possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this inquiry will resolve as No.

Both criteria must be met for this inquiry to resolve as Yes.

question.title: Will Joe Biden die before Saturday?
question.body:
Resolves YES if there is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. 

Otherwise, resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden not die before Saturday?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if there is no official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. 

Otherwise, resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Joe Biden will pass away before Saturday?
para_P.body:
This will be considered TRUE if there is a formal declaration of Joe Biden's passing prior to the market's closure at the end of Friday, July 26th. 

If not, it will be deemed FALSE.

question.title: Given Joe Biden dies before Saturday, will the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee be a Woman?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden dies before Saturday. This means there is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. Then, is it true that the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will be a woman? This resolves “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election, and “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

not_P.title: Given Joe Biden dies before Saturday, will the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee not be a Woman?
not_P.body: Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden dies before Saturday. This means there is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. Then, is it true that the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will not be a woman? This resolves “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election, and “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

para_P.title: If Joe Biden passes away prior to Saturday, will a Woman be the Nominee for the 2024 Democratic Presidential Election?
para_P.body: Assuming the following occurs: Joe Biden passes away before Saturday. This implies there is an official confirmation of Joe Biden's death before the market closes on Friday, July 26th. Under these circumstances, is it accurate to say that the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will be a woman? This will be considered “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates choose a female candidate for the presidential nomination in 2024, and “no” if/when they select a male candidate for the same election.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden dies before Saturday (b) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee is a Woman?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. Otherwise, resolves NO.
(b) Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election. Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

not_P.title: Will at least one of the following NOT occur: (a) Joe Biden dies before Saturday (b) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee is a Woman?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is no official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. Otherwise, resolves NO.
(b) Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election. Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of these events to take place: (a) Joe Biden passes away prior to Saturday (b) A Woman is chosen as the Democratic Presidential Nominee for 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) Resolves to YES if there is an official declaration of Joe Biden's passing before the market closes on Friday, July 26th. If not, it resolves to NO.
(b) Will resolve to 'yes' when the Democratic delegates choose a female candidate for the presidential nomination in the 2024 election. It will resolve to 'no' when a male candidate is selected by the Democratic delegates for the 2024 presidential nomination.

question.body:

question.title: Conditional on Taylor Swift's cameo, will Deadpool & Wolverine have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Taylor Swift appears in the movie 'Deadpool and Wolverine' in any role, even if it is just her voice used for a character. This will still be considered true even if she is not credited on IMDB, as long as it is confirmed by independent sources.

Then, will 'Deadpool & Wolverine' have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie? Analysts are projecting a huge opening weekend for the "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover movie. The film, directed by Shawn Levy and starring Ryan Reynolds, is projected to earn between $340 million and $360 million globally in its opening weekend. This would mark the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie. Domestically, the film is expected to debut with $160 million to $170 million, making it the biggest R-rated opening of all-time.

The record for the biggest opening weekend for an R-rated movie is the original Deadpool at $284.5M globally ($152.2M domestic). This market will resolve YES if 'Deadpool x Wolverine' grosses more than $284.5M globally this opening weekend according to reports AND the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) reports it as the record for an R-rated movie release.

In summary, if Taylor Swift cameos in the movie, will it break the record for the biggest opening weekend for an R-rated movie?

question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

question.title: Given Joe Biden announces he will not accept the Democratic nomination, will the Republicans retain Ohio's 6th district in 2024?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. This announcement must be definitive, public, and official, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the nomination in the 2024 election cycle. Given this scenario, will the Republican Party retain Ohio's 6th congressional district (previously held by Bill Johnson) in the 2024 special election? This question will resolve as Yes if credible sources report that a person representing the Republican Party has won the special election for OH's 6th district. If popular sources are in disagreement, an Ohio State source or statement will be used. If no election is held before January 1, 2025, the question is annulled.

not_P.title: Given Joe Biden announces he will accept the Democratic nomination, will the Republicans not retain Ohio's 6th district in 2024?
not_P.body: Suppose the following is true: Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, that he will accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President. If there is a discrepancy among popular sources, a source or statement from Ohio State will be utilized. If no election occurs before January 1, 2025, the question will be considered void.

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

(b) Will the Republican Party retain Ohio's 6th congressional district (previously held by Bill Johnson) in the 2024 special election?

This question will resolve as Yes if credible sources report that a person representing the Republican Party has won the special election for OH's 6th district. If popular sources are in disagreement, an Ohio State source or statement will be used. If no election is held before January 1, 2025, the question is annulled.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden announces before July 15, 2024, he will not accept the Democratic nomination for President, nor (b) the Republican Party retains Ohio's 6th congressional district in the 2024 special election?

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be ambiguous or inconclusive: it should leave room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. If such a definitive statement is made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

(b) Will the Republican Party not retain Ohio's 6th congressional district (previously held by Bill Johnson) in the 2024 special election?

This question will resolve as Yes if credible sources report that a person representing the Republican Party has not won the special election for OH's 6th district. If popular sources are in disagreement, an Ohio State source or statement will be used. If an election is held before January 1, 2025, the question is annulled.

para_P.title: Is it true that both of the following will happen: (a) Joe Biden will declare before July 15, 2024, that he will not seek the Democratic nomination for President, and (b) the Republican Party will keep control of Ohio's 6th congressional district in the 2024 special election?
para_P.body:
(a) Will Joe Biden make a public declaration before July 15, 2024, stating that he will not pursue the Democratic nomination for President?

This question will be answered with Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign publicly announces that he will not seek or accept the nomination of the Democratic Party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. For a Yes resolution, the announcement must be clear and definitive: it should eliminate any possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic nomination for President in the upcoming 2024 election. If such an announcement is not made by 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, the question will be resolved as No.

(b) Will the Republican Party maintain control of Ohio's 6th congressional district (previously represented by Bill Johnson) in the 2024 special election?

This question will be answered with Yes if reliable sources indicate that a candidate from the Republican Party has won the special election for Ohio's 6th district. In case of conflicting reports from popular sources, an official statement or source from Ohio will be considered. If no election occurs before January 1, 2025, the question will be rendered void.

question.title: Will Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will Israel not carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Will Israel execute a lethal strike inside Iran prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry resolves **Yes** if, subsequent to the date of this question's release and before May 1, 2024, reliable reports suggest that an assault ascribed to Israel and taking place within Iran's territory has resulted in the fatalities of at least five people.

question.title: Conditional on Israel carrying out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, will Iran's Guardian Council approve Mahmoud Ahmadinejad as a presidential candidate?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: Israel carries out an attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, leading to the death of at least five individuals, as indicated by credible reports. Then, will Iran's Guardian Council include Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name on its list of approved candidates for president of Iran? This question resolves **Yes** if Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election. If the condition is not met, resolves N/A.

not_P.title: Conditional on Israel carrying out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, will Iran's Guardian Council not approve Mahmoud Ahmadinejad as a presidential candidate?

para_P.body: Assuming the following occurs: Israel executes an operation within Iran before May 1, 2024, resulting in the fatalities of at least five people, as reported by reliable sources. Will Iran's Guardian Council then add Mahmoud Ahmadinejad to its roster of approved presidential candidates? This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name appears on the Guardian Council's list of eligible candidates for the forthcoming presidential election. If the initial condition is not satisfied, the resolution will be N/A.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, and (b) Iran's Guardian Council include Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name on its list of approved candidates for president of Iran?
question.body: (a) This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. (b) This question resolves **Yes** if Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, nor (b) Iran's Guardian Council include Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name on its list of approved candidates for president of Iran?
not_P.body: (a) This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. (b) This question resolves **Yes** if Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is not included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

para_P.title: Is it possible for both of the following to happen: (a) Israel executes a lethal strike inside Iran prior to May 1, 2024, and (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name appears on the Guardian Council's approved candidate list for the presidency of Iran?
para_P.body: (a) This question will be resolved as **Yes** if, after the publication of this question and before May 1, 2024, credible sources confirm that an attack attributed to Israel has taken place within Iran, resulting in the deaths of at least five people.
